DocLocalization.Name: Bezieht sich auf eine räumliche Struktur - Relation

DocAttribute.Name: RelatedElements
DocAttribute.Documentation: Set of products, which are referenced within this level of the spatial structure hierarchy. > NOTE  Referenced elements are contained elsewhere within the spatial structure, they are referenced additionally by this spatial structure element, e.g., because they span several stories.

DocAttribute.Name: RelatingStructure

DocWhereRule.Name: AllowedRelatedElements
DocWhereRule.Expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(temp <* RelatedElements | ('IFCPRODUCTEXTENSION.IFCSPATIALSTRUCTUREELEMENT' IN TYPEOF(temp)) AND (NOT ('IFCPRODUCTEXTENSION.IFCSPACE' IN TYPEOF(temp))) )) = 0
